    • bower

    Chance can be easily installed with Bower

    bower install chance

    then in the HTML of your app:

    <!-- Load Chance -->
<script type="text/javascript" src="bower_components/chance/chance.js"></script>
<script>
  // Use Chance
  alert(chance.string());
</script>
    bower
